name: The Reactive Herald
description: 'Build a Newsroom' project. Client side in React Redux, Rails API, TDD with Cypress and Rspec, CI with Semaphore and test coverage with Coveralls. Subscription payments through Stripe.

name: Cooper Run App
description: React front-end connected to Rails API, Devise authentication and TDD with RSpec and Cypress

name: Greta's Greens
description: Developed with Ruby on Rails, Quick food order application. Authentication with Devise, feature tests with Cucumber and unit tests with Rspec.  CI with Semaphore and test coverage with Coveralls

name: Rails Article Application
description: Minimally styled Rails application, Devise Authentication, Pundit authorization. Cucumber and Rspec TDD.

name: Legacy Code Challenge
description: Was assigned to fix errors and impliment testing on some legacy code writtin in Rails.

name: Address Book
description: Minimally styled browser based address book to store contacts. Written in javaScript, feature tests Cucumber.
